title: Anime: "Ninja Slayer From Animation", current impression
body:
Hello, nice to meet you. SEKAI desu.

I am here to inform you that studio Trigger's newest creation, "Ninja Slayer From Animation" is definitely  a fantastic addition to the anime media.

Much like Inferno Cop in both genre and art style, it's a gag anime in every sense of that word. Things are looking random, it's intentionally made to look bad and the premise/setting looks as generic as it gets initially. 

**But that DOES NOT mean the show is getting nowhere or is it boring!! Hell No.**

* The characters move your hearts without moving their bodies very much (and I mean it, literally). 
* The musics are very important in this title and they're very well placed, thoroughly enjoyable and stay true to the theme of this show.
* The story is actually there and decent, far exceeds anyone's expectations and more.
* The fight scenes are very imaginative and intense (mostly) due to an added flavour of how a child would play with their anime plastic action figures, giving it a fresh and long lasting taste of awe.
* It stays true to the source material, being a satire novel series.
* And "Ninja Slayer From Animation" in general, just oozes uniqueness that stands itself out from the crowd, begging to be explored.

It is a very interesting anime underneath all the facade it put up with, I am looking forward to every episode when it's released.

It's a series of planned 26 episodes but each is only 14 minute long.

This show atm gets a,
**Yeeart/10.**

Go watch it, highly recommended. YEEEEEEEEEEART!!!!
